text: 2.13 Lom 13.13, 1 Ko 11.20-21, Plp 3.19, Jud 12 Kɨli tap tɨmel gup okok nep gel amub, bɨ ogɨnap kɨlop pen abe gɨ tɨmel gɨnɨgabal. Chɨn subnab tap awl ñɨbɨlɨg, ñɨg kɨles ñɨbɨlɨg monmon mɨñmɨñ gɨnɨgun agɨl nepal. Kɨli nɨb ayɨp apnan gɨl tap jɨmñɨl ñɨbɨl, gach sek mɨdɨl nɨbop gel, yɨb nɨbop gɨ tɨmel gɨpal. Tap yepɨs anɨb okok gɨlɨg mɨñmɨñ gɨpal.
